p: Reasonably accurate models were developed to predict the area fractions of alpine vegetation communities by using topographic variables with the occurrence probability of the alpine vegetation zone from sub-model B1 (Spearman’s rank sum test, P. pumila community: rho = 0.90, p < 0.001, snowbed grassland community: rho = 0.44, p < 0.001, fellfield community: rho = 0.63, p < 0.001).
